title: South Africa's Eskom says power cuts likely on Wednesday
text:
South Africa's Eskom says power cuts likely on Wednesday

Commodities 17 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 08:06)

South Africa's Eskom says power cuts likely on Wednesday JOHANNESBURG, Oct 16 (Reuters) - South Africa's state power firm Eskom said it was likely to cut up to 2,000 megawatts of power from the national grid on Wednesday due to a shortage of generating capacity. Eskom made the announcement on Twitter and said a statement would follow.

South Africa's Eskom says power cuts likely on Wednesday
description: South Africa's Eskom says power cuts likely on Wednesday
